MemberSignature.Value: public static void DeleteHistoryTimeFrame (Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, long begin, long end);
.method public static hidebysig void DeleteHistoryTimeFrame(class Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, int64 begin, int64 end) cil managed
static member DeleteHistoryTimeFrame : Android.Content.ContentResolver * int64 * int64 -> unit

Docs.param: The ContentResolver used to access the database.
First date to remove. If -1, all dates before end. Inclusive.
Last date to remove. If -1, all dates after begin. Non-inclusive.
Docs.summary: Delete all history items from begin to end.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void UpdateVisitedHistory (Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, string url, bool real);
.method public static hidebysig void UpdateVisitedHistory(class Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, string url, bool real) cil managed
static member UpdateVisitedHistory : Android.Content.ContentResolver * string * bool -> unit

Docs.param: The ContentResolver used to access the database.
The site being visited.
If true, this is an actual visit, and should add to the number of visits. If false, the user entered it manually.
Docs.summary: Update the visited history to acknowledge that a site has been visited.
